Skill.name: Poison Resistance
Skill.description: Grants protection against the effects of poison.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of poison by 30%.
Reduces the duration of poison by 60%.

Skill.name: Paralysis Resistance
Skill.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

Skill.name: Sleep Resistance
Skill.description: Reduces the duration of sleep.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

Skill.name: Stun Resistance
Skill.description: Reduces stun duration.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of stun by 30%.
Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.

Skill.name: Muck Resistance
Skill.description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.

ranks.description: Reduces limits on movement speed and evasion.

Skill.name: Blast Resistance
Skill.description: Grants protection against blastblight.

ranks.description: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

Skill.name: Bleeding Resistance
Skill.description: Grants protection against bleeding.

Skill.name: Iron Skin
Skill.description: Grants protection against Defense Down.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 30%.
Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 60%.

Skill.name: Earplugs
Skill.description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

ranks.description: Slightly reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

Skill.name: Windproof
Skill.description: Grants protection against wind pressure.

ranks.description: Slightly reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Negates minor wind pressure and reduces the effects of major wind pressure.
Negates minor and major wind pressure.

Skill.name: Tremor Resistance
Skill.description: Grants protection against ground tremors.

ranks.description: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

Skill.name: Dungmaster
Skill.description: Makes monsters hit with slinger dung pods more likely to run.

ranks.description: Makes slinger dung pods more effective at making monsters run away.

Skill.name: Effluvial Expert
Skill.description: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

ranks.description: Nullifies damage from effluvia and reduces damage from acids.

Skill.name: Heat Guard
Skill.description: Nullifies damage from heat.

Skill.name: Attack Boost
Skill.description: Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.

Skill.name: Defense Boost
Skill.description: Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.

Skill.name: Health Boost
Skill.description: Increases health.

Skill.name: Recovery Up
Skill.description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

Skill.name: Recovery Speed
Skill.description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

ranks.description: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

Skill.name: Fire Resistance
Skill.description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Skill.name: Water Resistance
Skill.description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Skill.name: Ice Resistance
Skill.description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Skill.name: Thunder Resistance
Skill.description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Skill.name: Dragon Resistance
Skill.description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Skill.name: Blight Resistance
Skill.description: Grants protection against all elemental blights.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 30%.
Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 60%.

Skill.name: Fire Attack
Skill.description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Skill.name: Water Attack
Skill.description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Skill.name: Ice Attack
Skill.description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has as maximum limit.)

Skill.name: Thunder Attack
Skill.description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Skill.name: Dragon Attack
Skill.description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Skill.name: Poison Attack
Skill.description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

Skill.name: Paralysis Attack
Skill.description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

Skill.name: Sleep Attack
Skill.description: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Elemental buildup has maximum limit.)

Skill.name: Blast Attack
Skill.description: Increases the rate of the blast buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

Skill.name: Normal Shots
Skill.description: Increases the attack power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

ranks.description: Increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

Skill.name: Piercing Shots
Skill.description: Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

ranks.description: Increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

Skill.name: Spread/Power Shots
Skill.description: Increases the attack power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

ranks.description: Increases the power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

Skill.name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
Skill.description: Unlocks your weapon's hidden element. Also increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)

ranks.description: Draws out 33% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
Draws out 66% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
Draws out 100% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

Skill.name: Critical Eye
Skill.description: Increases affinity.

Skill.name: Critical Boost
Skill.description: Increases the damage of critical hits.

ranks.description: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 35%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 40%.

Skill.name: Weakness Exploit
Skill.description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

ranks.description: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

Skill.name: Focus
Skill.description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

ranks.description: Increases gauge fill rate by 5% and reduces charge times by 5%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 10% and reduces charge times by 10%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 20% and reduces charge times by 20%.

Skill.name: Power Prolonger
Skill.description: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.

Skill.name: Handicraft
Skill.description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauage. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

Skill.name: Critical Draw
Skill.description: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks.

Skill.name: Partbreaker
Skill.description: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.

Skill.name: Slugger
Skill.description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

Skill.name: Stamina Thief
Skill.description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

Skill.name: Master Mounter
Skill.description: Makes it easier to mount monsters.

ranks.description: Makes it easier to mount monsters and down mounted monsters.

Skill.name: Airborne
Skill.description: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.

Skill.name: Latent Power
Skill.description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

ranks.description: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

Skill.name: Agitator
Skill.description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

ranks.description: While active, grants attack +4 and increases affinity by 3%.
While active, grants attack +8 and increases affinity by 6%.
While active, grants attack +12 and increases affinity by 9%.
While active, grants attack +16 and increases affinity by 12%.
While active, grants attack +20 and increases affinity by 15%.

Skill.name: Peak Performance
Skill.description: Increases attack when your health is full.

Skill.name: Heroics
Skill.description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

ranks.description: While active, increases attack power by 5% and increases defense by 15 points.
While active, increases attack power by 10% and increases defense by 20 points.
While active, increases attack power by 15% and increases defense by 25 points.
While active, increases attack power by 20% and increases defense by 30 points.
While active, increases attack power by 30% and increases defense by 40 points.

Skill.name: Fortify
Skill.description: Increases your attack and defense every time you fall in battle. (This effect can stack twice.)

ranks.description: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

Skill.name: Resentment
Skill.description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

Skill.name: Resuscitate
Skill.description: Improves evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.

ranks.description: While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

Skill.name: Horn Maestro
Skill.description: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

ranks.description: Extends melody effect duration and increases health recovery.

Skill.name: Capacity Boost
Skill.description: Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

Skill.name: Special Ammo Boost
Skill.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

ranks.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

Skill.name: Artillery
Skill.description: Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.

ranks.description: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

Skill.name: Heavy Artillery
Skill.description: Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.

Skill.name: Marathon Runner
Skill.description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

Skill.name: Constitution
Skill.description: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.

Skill.name: Leap of Faith
Skill.description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.

Skill.name: Stamina Surge
Skill.description: Speeds up stamina recovery.

Skill.name: Hunger Resistance
Skill.description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

ranks.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 30%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 60%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

Skill.name: Evade Window
Skill.description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

Skill.name: Evade Extender
Skill.description: Increases evade distance.

Skill.name: Guard
Skill.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

ranks.description: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 15%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 30%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 50%.

Skill.name: Quick Sheath
Skill.description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

Skill.name: Wide-Range
Skill.description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

ranks.description: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with full efficacy.

Skill.name: Item Prolonger
Skill.description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

Skill.name: Free Meal
Skill.description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

Skill.name: Speed Eating
Skill.description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

Skill.name: Speed Sharpening
Skill.description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

ranks.description: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

Skill.name: Bombardier
Skill.description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

Skill.name: Mushroomancer
Skill.description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

ranks.description: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

Skill.name: Master Fisher
Skill.description: Improves your skill at fishing.

ranks.description: Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.

Skill.name: Pro Transporter
Skill.description: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.

ranks.description: Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.

Skill.name: Master Gatherer
Skill.description: Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.

ranks.description: Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.

Skill.name: Honey Hunter
Skill.description: Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.

Skill.name: Carving Pro
Skill.description: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.

Skill.name: Divine Blessing
Skill.description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

ranks.description: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

Skill.name: Palico Rally
Skill.description: Powers up Palicoes.

ranks.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

Skill.name: Botanist
Skill.description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

ranks.description: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect or mushroom item per gather.

Skill.name: Geologist
Skill.description: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.

ranks.description: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, gathering points, and mining outcrops.

Skill.name: Maximum Might
Skill.description: Increases affinity when stamina is full.

Skill.name: Slinger Capacity
Skill.description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field.

ranks.description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for some slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.

Skill.name: Stealth
Skill.description: Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

ranks.description: Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it moderately easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

Skill.name: Flinch Free
Skill.description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

ranks.description: Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

Skill.name: Scoutfly Range Up
Skill.description: Expands your scoutflies' detection range.

Skill.name: Speed Crawler
Skill.description: Increases movement speed while crouching.

Skill.name: Jump Master
Skill.description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

Skill.name: Sporepuff Expert
Skill.description: Recover health when using sporepuffs.

Skill.name: Aquatic Expert
Skill.description: Improves mobility in water.

ranks.description: Prevents water from slowing movement and improves evasion while in water.
Prevents water from slowing movement and greatly improves evasion while in water.

Skill.name: Cliffhanger
Skill.description: Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy.

ranks.description: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 25%.

Skill.name: Blindsider
Skill.description: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

ranks.description: Increases the success rate of flash effects.

Skill.name: Scholar
Skill.description: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. (Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)

ranks.description: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.

Skill.name: Entomologist
Skill.description: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.

ranks.description: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

Skill.name: Effluvia Resistance
Skill.description: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.

Skill.name: Scenthound
Skill.description: Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.

Skill.name: Forager's Luck
Skill.description: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.

ranks.description: Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.

Skill.name: Detector
Skill.description: Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.

ranks.description: Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.

Skill.name: BBQ Master
Skill.description: Improves your skill at cooking meat.

ranks.description: Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.

Skill.name: Tool Specialist
Skill.description: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.

Skill.name: Affinity Sliding
Skill.description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

ranks.description: Increases affinity by 30% for a short time after sliding.

Skill.name: Intimidator
Skill.description: Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. (No effect on certain monsters.)

ranks.description: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

Skill.name: Hasten Recovery
Skill.description: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

ranks.description: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

Skill.name: Super Recovery
Skill.description: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

ranks.description: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

Skill.name: Poison Duration Up
Skill.description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

ranks.description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

Skill.name: Adrenaline
Skill.description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

ranks.description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

Skill.name: Stamina Cap Up
Skill.description: Increases stamina cap.

Skill.name: Critical Element
Skill.description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

ranks.description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

Skill.name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
Skill.description: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

ranks.description: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

Skill.name: Bludgeoner
Skill.description: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

ranks.description: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

Skill.name: Non-elemental Boost
Skill.description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

ranks.description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

Skill.name: Capture Master
Skill.description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Skill.name: Guard Up
Skill.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

ranks.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

Skill.name: Guts
Skill.description: Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).

ranks.description: Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).

Skill.name: Master's Touch
Skill.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

ranks.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

Skill.name: Nullify Wind Pressure
Skill.description: Negates all wind pressure.

Skill.name: Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
Skill.description: Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

ranks.description: Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

Skill.name: Critical Status
Skill.description: Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

ranks.description: Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

Skill.name: Good Luck
Skill.description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Skill.name: Bow Charge Plus
Skill.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

ranks.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

Skill.name: Punishing Draw
Skill.description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.

ranks.description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.

Skill.name: Protective Polish
Skill.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

ranks.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

Skill.name: Poison Functionality
Skill.description: Allows you to apply poison coatings.

Skill.name: Para Functionality
Skill.description: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.

Skill.name: Sleep Functionality
Skill.description: Allows you to apply sleep coatings.

Skill.name: Blast Functionality
Skill.description: Allows you to apply blast coatings.

Skill.name: Elderseal Boost
Skill.description: Increases the Elderseal of weapons and dragon ammo.

Skill.name: Great Luck
Skill.description: High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.description: High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Skill.name: Carving Master
Skill.description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Skill.name: Elemental Airborne
Skill.description: Elemental damage increased for jumping attacks.

Skill.name: Igni Intensity
Skill.description: Only those who complete the rigorous witcher training are allowed to use the powerful magic of the Igni Sign.
